pr_title: Migrate the accumulator task last search date from a file to the DB

timeline.bodyText: This is wrong because field_value should be a VARCHAR.
timeline.author: gkillough
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -70,7 +70,7 @@
         <insert schemaName="alert" tableName="field_values">
             <column name="config_id" valueComputed="GET_OLD_BLACK_DUCK_PROVIDER_CONFIG_ID()"/>
             <column name="field_id" valueComputed="GET_FIELD_ID('provider.common.config.enabled')"/>
-            <column name="field_value" value="true"/>
+            <column name="field_value" valueBoolean="true"/>

timeline.message: Feat(Liquibase): Migrate the accumulator task last search date from a file to the DB
Fix(Liquibase): Use correct value for field_values table
Fix(Liquibase): Use correct value for field_values table
Fix(Liquibase): Remove resolved TODO for h2 workaround
